Description:
Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to dangerous parts of the machinery, namely the rotating chuck and tool of the Cincinnati Milacron pillar drill (serial no. 18800).

Improvement Notice served,


You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to dangerous parts of the machinery, namely the trapping point between the punch and the bed of the machine on the Edwards combination metalworking machine (serial no. 05865105).

Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to dangerous parts of the machinery, namely the rotating chuck and tool of the XYZ Pro3000 milling machine (serial no. 8840).

Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to substances hazardous to health, namely mild and stainless steel welding fume, which is a known carcinogen and cause of occupational asthma, is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.

Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to ensure that the local exhaust ventilation plant provided to prevent or control exposure to substances which are hazardous to health, namely welding fume, has been thoroughly examined and tested by a competent person in the last 14 months.

Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to make and give effect to such arrangements as are appropriate, having regard to the nature of your activities, for the effective planning, organisation, control, monitoring and review of the preventative and protective measures required to protect employees from the risk of using water-mix metalworking fluid.

Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to ensure that workers liable to be exposed to a substance hazardous to health, namely stainless steel welding fume, are under suitable health surveillance.
